H7197.def: = action by which humans come together for a common purpose

H3700.def: = state/process by which humans, deities, or animals experience a strong desire to see an object or perform an event

H2962.def: = a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time

H2706.def: = specific actions required by somebody in authority

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4671.def: = debris and husks crushed and separated from grain and carried away by the wind when threshing and winnowing ≈ associated especially with the transient nature and disappearance of evil people and enemies.

H2740.def: = process by which objects become extremely dry ► and therefore highly inflammable

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6035.def: = state of persons who are suffering and unable to help themselves ◄ because of their own need or status, or the result of someone else's behavior ≈ often used positively of persons who are sincere and not arrogant in their behavior

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6466.def: = action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H194.def: = marker indicating that the information that follows is possibly true but that there is no complete certainty

H5641.def: = state in which people or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H3774.def: = member of ethnic group; ► possibly another name for {L:Philistine<SDBH:פְּלִשְׁתִּי>}

H3667.def: = man; ◄ youngest son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Canaanites<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H831.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the five cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H5467.def: = town; ◄ located near {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; ► town where {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} settled, when he separated himself from {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; destroyed with {L:Gomorrah<SDBH:עֲמֹרָה>}

H5983.def: = nation; ◄ situated E. of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; according to {S:00101903800100200} founded by {L:Ben-Ammi<SDBH:בֶּן־עַמִּי>}, son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H2738.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = plant with thorns or another desert shrub, like nettle (|iUrtica dioica|i* or |iUrtica pilulifera|i*); ► useless; ≈ symbol of uncultivated areas

H4379.def: exact meaning unsure; probably: = an area where the soil contains a large concentration of salt and other minerals that render it infertile

H4417.def: = white crystalline substance, mainly consisting of sodium chloride; ► normally used for seasoning or preserving food; ≈ associated with infertility of the soil but also with permanence

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H962.def: = action by which someone takes all sorts of goods (including people and animals) by force from an enemy in war

H3499.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H339.def: = area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H3569.def: = member of the ethnic group ◄ that is regarded as descendants of Cush, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6828.def: = a mountain, identified with Jebel ʾel-Aqraʿ ◄ in northern Syria, ► known by the Canaanites as the mountain of the gods

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H804.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of Assyria

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H5210.def: = town; ◄ located in northern Mesopotamia near Mosul on the east bank of the {L:Tigris<SDBH:חִדֶּקֶל>}; ► built by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>} after the {L:flood<SDBH:מַבּוּל>}; ancient capital of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, preached against by the prophet {L:Jonah<SDBH:יֹונָה>}

H6723.def: = state in which there is a lack of water or rainfall, ► resulting in lack of vegetation and other desert-like conditions

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H5739.def: = a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H6893.def: exact meaning unsure: = relatively small black bird; ► unclean; ≈ associated with loneliness, devastation, destruction, and possibly death

H3730.def: = object in the shape of the bud of a flower; ◄ part of the lampstand located in the tabernacle; ► added for decoration purposes

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H2474.def: = an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

H2721.def: = state in which an object is free from moisture or liquid

H5592.def: = receptacle of undetermined size; ◄ made out of metal; ► used both for household and religious purposes

H6168.def: = causative action by which humans or deities cause the outer layer covering an object to be removed

H731.def: = part of a construction made out of {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} wood

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H983.def: = state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H8047.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H4769.def: literally: a place for lying down; hence: = a place where animals can rest in relative safety

H5128.def: = process by which objects move up and down or sideways

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
